pkgmetadata.longdescription: Change Point Detection with Missing Values // A four step change point detection method that can detect break points with the presence of missing values proposed by Liu and Safikhani (2023) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1a8sV3RJ8VofLWikTDTQ7W4XJ76cEj4 Fg/view?usp=drive_link.
